title: Darker-www.oldgames.sk-Compilation
description:
*******************************************************************************
*                                 DJ OldGames                                 *
*******************************************************************************

+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                             General Information                             |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
Game.............: Darker
Developer........: Psygnosis Limited
Publisher........: Psygnosis Limited
Release Year.....: 1995
Category.........: Simulation, Plane
Genre............: sci-fi, flight
Platforms........: PC

+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                   Technical Information for this version                    |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
Platform.........: PC (DOS)
Graphics.........: VGA
DOSBox v0.72.....: Supported
Languages........: English

+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                 Description                                 |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
Darker has the player assume the role of Tolly, a civilian shuttle pilot in the 
city of Delphi, the only city situated on the dark side of a planet in 
synchronous rotation around the local star. The player must defend Delphi from 
the Halons, inhabitants of the planet's light side, who are invading Delphi...
